title: Smoked salmon and leek quiche
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '100g butter', '200g plain flour', '1 egg', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 pinch salt', 'For the filling', '1kg leeks', '2 tablespoons butter', '4 eggs', '6 tablespoons crème fraîche', '200g smoked salmon, cut in strips', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon white pepper', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon lemon juice']
